system.sustained: The Psyker hurls a bolt of force at a target. On suceeding Focus Power Test, bolt automatically hits, dealing 1d10+2+(2xPsy Rating) Impact Damage. If psyker scores 3 degrees of success on focus power test, bolt also knocks target prone and pushes them back by 1d5 metres. As this is a ranged attack, it can be dodged.
